amendment.description: To make available from Research, Development, Test and Evaluation, Navy, up to $1,000,000 for an integrated, low-cost, low-power Multibeam Side Scan Sonar System for Unmanned Underwater Vehicle.

action.text: Amendment SA 4829 proposed by Senator Stevens for Senator Sununu.

vote.text: Amendment SA 4829 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
